Guarded Land.name: Guarded Land
Guarded Land.flavor: The landâ€™s spirits awaken, answering your plea for aid.
Guarded Land.effect: You mark each enemy in the blast until the end of your next turn. The blast creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter, or until a creature uses arcane defiling within the zone. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. You can move the zone 1 square as part of a move action, or 3 squares as a move action.

Land's Rebuke.name: Land's Rebuke
Land's Rebuke.flavor: The land is your ally, and at your call it rises up to smash your enemies.
Land's Rebuke.trigger: An enemy within the zone created by your guarded land and marked by you makes an attack that does not include you as a target.
Land's Rebuke.target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land
Land's Rebuke.attack: Primary ability + 6 (9 at 21st level) vs. Fortitude
Land's Rebuke.onHit: 2d10 + ability modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.

Awakened Fury.name: Awakened Fury
Awakened Fury.flavor: The land stirs to violence, snatching and rending your enemies.
Awakened Fury.target: Each enemy within the zone created by guarded land
Awakened Fury.onHit: 3d8 + ability modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Awakened Fury.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Land Stride.name: Land Stride
Land Stride.flavor: While on or near the lands you guard, nothing can hold you.
Land Stride.requirement: You are within the zone created by guarded land or adjacent to it.
Land Stride.effect: You teleport 3 squares to a square within the zone created by guarded land.
